name: Switzerland
declaringWar: I cannot stand your antics any longer! You will soon learn their true cost, in war.
attacked: Then war it shall be! Though I'm afraid your ambitions shall soon be put to rest!
defeated: Our defenses have crumbled... but still we will not rest.
introduction: Well met! I am Jonas Furrer, hailing from Switzerland. If you are in need of military services, you are speaking to the right man.
tradeRequest: I believe this would help serve both of our interests.
uniques: Gain [30] Influence with a [Pikeman] gift to a City-State
All newly-trained [Pikeman] units [in all cities] receive the [Swiss Mercenary] promotion
May buy [Pikeman] units with [Gold] for [2] times their normal Production cost
